sentence: But  I  didn't  go  to  the  altar;  to  be  honest  it  wasn't  for  lack  of  offers,  but  because  they  always  seemed  to  come  from  people  I  wouldn't  have  been  caught  dead  at  an  altar  with.
label: I

sentence: She  adds:  ‘ Two  years  ago,  you  wouldn't  have  caught  me  dead  getting  married  but  now  I  think  it'd  be  nice  to  have  a  husband  —  and  a  little  girl  I  could  teach  to  ride . ’
label: I
